Address.label: Address
Address.value: 52 HUNG TO ROAD,12TH FLOOR UNIT B, KWUN TONG, Hong Kong

CompanyDescription.label: Company Description
CompanyDescription.value: Alpha Technology Group Limited, an investment holding company, provides IT development and consulting service in Hong Kong. The company primarily offers cloud-based customer relationship management systems and enterprise resource planning systems development; customized web and mobile application development; artificial intelligence powered optical character recognition service software development; and technological support and maintenance and other services. It serves customers from various industries, including consulting, real estate, architectural design, carpark management, electronic payment services, logistics, investments, retail, textiles, wholesale, and distribution. The company was incorporated in 2022 and is based in Kwun Tong, Hong Kong. Alpha Technology Group Limited operates as a subsidiary of Wittelsbach Group Holdings Limited.
